name: wobble_head
description:
Make the robot wobble its head in circular motion.

This performs a circular wobble motion using roll and pitch variations.

optional.name: duration
optional.description: Total duration of the wobble motion in seconds

optional.name: radius
optional.description: Radius of the circular motion in degrees

optional.name: speed
optional.description: Speed of wobble in circles per second

optional.name: speech
optional.description: Optional text to speak via TTS while wobbling head
